law.catch_line: Voting or consent by beneficial owners.

text.section: Except as provided in subsection (1) of this section, the beneficial owners act by a majority of the beneficial interests.
A beneficial owner may vote in person or by proxy, but if by proxy, the proxy must be contained in a signed record.

law.history: Created 2012 Ky. Acts ch. 81, sec. 46, effective July 12, 2012.
